title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 7.2 - Sale of cheese and cheese curd regulated
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 7.2 - Sale of cheese and cheese curd regulated

State Regulations

No person shall release cheese or cheese curd to the retail
trade or to any public eating place or to any institution or to any consumer
unless such cheese or cheese curd has been either: (a) pasteurized; (b) made from pasteurized milk; or
(c) held after manufacture for a period of
not less than 60 days at a temperature not lower than 35 degrees

Fahrenheit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง
7.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
